table.name: civicrm_financial_type
table.comment: Formerly civicrm_contribution_type merged into this table in 4.3

field.name: id
field.title: Financial Type ID
field.comment: ID of original financial_type so you can search this table by the financial_type.id and then select the relevant version based on the timestamp

field.name: accounting_code
field.title: Accounting Code
field.comment: Optional value for mapping contributions to accounting system codes for each type/category of contribution.

field.name: is_deductible
field.title: Is Tax Deductible?
field.comment: Is this financial type tax-deductible? If true, contributions of this type may be fully OR partially deductible - non-deductible amount is stored in the Contribution record.

field.name: is_reserved
field.title: Financial Type is Reserved?
field.comment: Is this a predefined system object?
